sentence.Network_en: He was given two twelve month sentences to run concurrently.
sentence.Network_cn: 他两罪均判12个月监禁,同期执行.

sentence.Network_en: He was jailed for 33 months to run concurrently with a sentence he is already serving for burglary.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被判33个月的监禁，与他因入室盗窃已在服的刑期合并执行。

sentence.Network_en: He was given two prison sentences, to run concurrently.
sentence.Network_cn: 他两罪均判监禁, 同期执行.

concurrent centrifuge 无逆流离心机concurrent computer 并行计算机concurrent flow mixer 顺流混合器

entry.def: Concurrent events or situations happen at the same time.

example.ex: Galerie St. Etienne is holding three concurrent exhibitions...
example.tran: 圣艾蒂安美术馆同时举办3场展览。

example.ex: He will actually be serving three concurrent five-year sentences...
example.tran: 实际上，他将服3个5年徒刑，合并执行。

sentences.sentence: "concurrently with the conference an exhibition of things associated with Rutherford was held"
"going to school and holding a job at the same time"
